name: test_e2e_with_logs[092_SQLI_STACK_004]
description:

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_STACK_004` |
| **Name** | Backdoor table creation attempt |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | stacked_queries |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |
